title: Which champions that were recently added that would be insane in URF
body:
title!

i think Rek'sai and Gnar as the tunnels will be insane and the Gnar Boomerang will be constant with gnar being uncatchable from Hyper and the passive MS buff

Also Azir's Ult will be up constantly

Rek'sai

terrifying
Just edited this in, but fury worked normally. Otherwise Shy would get stuck in drag and Tryn's heal would have been absolutely stupid.

Aww... that makes me sad

i was hoping for perma regen Rak'sai

Reksai in urf won't be as strong as the previous favorites. her mobility capped by the slowish animation speed of her e, her ap q's getting nerfed damage wise and 80% cd would make it 2.8 sec which is still pathetic when you compare to urf hybrid ez. ad q's already low enough so perma aoe is good, but then everyone else with aoe that were managated will have their aoe permanently too. spammable true damage is op though (but again... there's a slight animation delay between her twirl on her q and bite). so not as good as urf vayne. overall average :/

Sona was already op in the previous urf; so much so, she was removed I think.

Sion's still too slow, especially now that those with gap closers have even more gap closers {{champion:81}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:105}} , etc. so rip sion's passive

I don't see how urf AS buff really makes kalista god level... for vayne, sure she gets more silver bolts, but she also gets perma tumbles and spammable condemn. kalista's not really mana-gated; she can chuck spears, but nidalee does it better.

Overall Azir's the only OP one in urf :/
Gnar could have potential but I haven't played him at all so I can't say.

{{champion:268}} The URF buff gives ranged campions x2 attack speed  and the fact that Azir's passive gives attack speed, I'm guessing that at lv 1, he will have the highest attack speed in the game. Along with having the cool down to summon 4 to 5 soldiers attacking at the same time. Do some math on the damage and cry every time you see it.

Also, when URF comes, try Lissandra with maxing E first. You can almost outrun Hecarim with the bonus of going over walls. She was sleeper OP.

*Almost* lol. I loved playing Hackarim in urf XD Also Alistar. And Zac was pretty awesome imo. Just jungle or lane against someone that doesn't outrange you like crazy and after the early game you're a crazy ass tank ^_^

Helicopter Hackarim was terrifying

watch Dunderball's video of it, the Q is constant
azir, instant as cap, also, he dosent have a real cap on  his soldiers, so he can have as many as he wants out at a time until they time out

I think the only onw would be Azir :P

Gnar? Meh

Kalista? Nope

Rekt'sai? Limit tunnel soooo, nope


Azir? he's gonna have he's own personal army.

Gnar would have been scary as he  have multiple Q boomerangs flying at once, meaning perma slow into megaform for the perma stun with W wallop being on a less than 2 second cooldown and Ult. A good Gnar would be able to solo entire teams since he could just keep them stunned and slowed. In mini form he'd never be caught because hop would be on a 2.4 second cooldown, which is almost as long as the animation for double bounce. So Gnar would wrek Urf mode and possibly have been disabled.

Reksai would also be a pain do deal with. Tunnels are limited yes but only having to wait 3.6 seconds to use another would give her the power to chase down virtually anyone. she'd have her E up every 2.4 seconds and would be able to max fury quickly with her .2 cdr Q so E would almost always deal true damage. And 500-800 true damage every 2.4 seconds hurts quite a bit.

Kalista is just a horrible champ in my opinion so she's wouldn't do anything in urf just like she does nothing in normal play.

oh god i just found another

Syndra

all the balls
The best URF charecter was Inmortal Swain, lvl 6 and well, you only have 3 abilities :P

also how is Kathus  OP in urf? i don't really get it, sure he has a global ult but it doesn't really make sense


also Fiddlesticks

Terrifying :(

IMO Gnar would be gimped in URF, as the insane AS buff and boomerang spam would leave him pretty much stuck in Mega Gnar. They'd also have to remove the tunnel cap for Rek'Sai to be meaningful.

Kalista would be insane, but Braum would never have a shield down, not to mention spamming Q as a ranged basic attack with a stun on it. Holy crap. I want to play Braum so bad when they finally do bring back URF. Also, as you said, Sona. She'd still be weaker than pre-rework URF Sona though.
